headline: EDHEC BUSINESS SCHOOL MSC MARKETING ANALYTICS
summary: Possess excellent client communication skills and build excellent relationships with customers. Love to learn, like to try all new things, and have the courage to change majors into marketing. Intermediate level of French. Looking for a six-month internship on marketing starting on July 2023.

experiences.title: Marketing Assistant
experiences.description:
-Fully understood the functions of products, assisted in the shooting of product marketing photos and updating website product information.
-Assisted the marketing team in email direct sales by consulting suppliers for detailed product information and provided them with more accurate product information and prices.
-Searched for attractive products on the supply website, negotiated the most favorable price, achieved sales of 500 units and generated sales revenue of 11,325 euros by selecting the optimal packaging and shipping methods.

experiences.title: Financial Manager
experiences.description:
• Used CRM system to maintain customer relationship. Accomplished a satisfactory achievement with
the 600 customers and the financial assets scale of 350 million RMB.
• Promoted the event through social network and created marketing content. Once successfully helped a
client realize financial asset allocation of 1 million RMB.

experiences.title: Bank Teller
experiences.description:
• Organized customer feedback activities and responsible for customer service, prepared and distributed
the activities materials.
• Participated in the competition to select the "Thousand Best Outlets" of Bank of China and finally won
the title of "Thousand Best Outlets".

experiences.company: BDO China-SHU LUN PAN Certified Public Accountants LLP
experiences.title: Audit Assistant
experiences.description: Data analysis: Responsible for the project audit of Meituan company which is China's leading e-commerce platform for services and the audit of financial statements of 22 Meituan's subsidiaries. Extracted the required data from nearly 100 company reports and independently completed the audit report.

education.description:
• Developed a marketing strategy for Ubisoft using Canva, Tableau and SPSS. 
• Got a CRM certification of Microsoft Dynamic CRM 365. 
• Recommended the Saleshub to the company through a presentation. 
• Developed a marketing strategy with a budget of 400 euros for an animation Mila and Marko.
education.activities_and_societies: Models in Marketing, Advanced Consumer Psychology, Social Media Optimization, Fitness, Painting.

education.description: Dissertation in Analysis on the Effectiveness of Financial Performance Evaluation of Listed Waste-to-energy industry: Built the comprehensive evaluation model by SPSS and concluded the performance evaluation.
